full_summary:
**Bid Solicitation Announcement for Senior Life Cycle Management Specialist**
----------

**Notice of Proposal:**
The Department of National Defence (DND) is issuing a Bid Solicitation for a Senior Life Cycle Management Specialist to provide support for Directorate Aerospace Equipment Program Management (TA&S). The successful bidder will provide life cycle services to the DND under Task and Solutions Professional Services (TSPS).

**Proposal Submission Deadline:** Amendment of closing date extended to 14 February 2023, 14:00 EST. All other terms and conditions remain the same.

**Background:**
The requirement is open to pre-qualified suppliers under the TSPS Arrangement (E60ZT-18TSPS/Tier 1). The DND has a need for the services of a Senior Life Cycle Management Specialist for the following task: 

* Stream 5: Technical Engineering and Maintenance Services
* Category 16: Life Cycle Management Specialist

The selected bidder will provide services for three years, with the option to extend the term for two more years. The estimated level of effort is 240 days per year.

**Key Requirements:**

* GSIN: R008A Technical Engineering and Maintenance Services (TEMS) (Excludes requirements related to armament, R&D and R&O)
* Security Clearance: FSC - Secret
* Location of Work: National Capital Region (NCR), specifically at 455 Blvd de la Carrière, Gatineau, QC

**Proposal Submission Instructions:**
Prospective bidders must submit their proposals through the DND Point of Contact (PoC). The DND will contact the pre-qualified suppliers with instructions on how to obtain the Request for Proposal (RFP) documents.

**Pre-qualified Suppliers:**
The following suppliers have been invited to submit their proposals: ACF Associates Inc., ADGA Group Consultants Inc., and 23 other suppliers (list provided in the original text).

**Contact Information:**
Tony Seng, DND PoC, tony.seng@forces.gc.ca.

**Important Notes:**
All proposals must be submitted in either official language of Canada. The DND reserves the right to reject any proposal. Bidders are advised to review the TSPS Method of Supply, which is available on the Government Electronic Tendering System (https://buyandsell.gc.ca/tenders).  - end of notice.

**Bidder must note that this is a “Request for Proposal” (RFP), not a “Request for Tender” (RFT)**.

H
